reviewText: on one hand the book does provide some useful information and tools and if I thought R was the thing I would be more engaged but really this book is about R and doing machine learning sorts of things with R.  Really when it says for Hackers I would want to see some C# or C++ or JavaScript or Java or Object C etc.  With the title Machine Learning for Hackers we really are missing the mark with all the R.
title: Machine Learning for Hackers
